Smart Scroller: Effortless Reading, Enhanced Browsing

Revolutionize your online reading experience with Smart Scroller, the ultimate auto-scrolling extension for Chrome. Designed for avid readers, researchers, and anyone who wants to streamline their browsing, Smart Scroller offers a hands-free way to navigate web content.

Key Features:
• Three Scrolling Modes: Choose from Continuous, Stepwise, or Smart scrolling to suit your reading style.
• Adjustable Speed: Fine-tune your scrolling speed with an intuitive slider.
• Smart Mode: Intelligently scrolls to the next paragraph or section, ensuring you never miss important content.
• Highlight Scroll: Optionally highlight the current reading area for enhanced focus.
• Customizable Step Height: In Stepwise mode, set your preferred scroll distance.
• Auto-Pause: Scrolling automatically stops when you interact with the page.

Perfect for:
✓ Long-form articles and blog posts
✓ Research papers and academic texts
✓ News websites and online magazines
✓ Documentation and technical manuals
✓ Hands-free browsing while multitasking

Smart Scroller adapts to your reading pace and content structure, making it easier than ever to consume online information. Whether you're catching up on the news, studying for exams, or simply enjoying a good read, Smart Scroller enhances your browsing experience with smooth, customizable auto-scrolling.

Boost your productivity and reading comfort today with Smart Scroller – your personal guide through the web's endless content!
